about_the_game:
Explore a mysterious labyrinth of rooms and hallways, but be careful - for you are not alone in the Hallway of Horrors.

Be careful indeed, as if you die, you die for good - there is no saving, so if you quit or die you will have to try from the beginning.

Features you can expect:

- Permadeath gameplay
- Realistic Graphics using Unreal Engine 5.2
- 30 unique rooms for you to explore, intricately decorated to resemble real-life environments
- 5 different monsters to scare you, each with their own unique behaviour
- Unsettling ambience for each room
- Short and Sweet: The game can be completed within 30 minutes to 2 hours depending on how often the player dies.
- A psychedelic atmosphere
- Jumpscares

This game is played by walking through a series of small to large rooms using a VR-teleport based movement system. In most cases, a green light will signal where the door to the next room is. Red will signify danger. A virtual reality headset is required to play this game. Like all horror games, this game is best played alone in a dark room.
